name: "The Dresden Files" - "The Other Dick" Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: What was Harry doing at the start of the episode?
questions.correct: Taking a class to get his P.I. license
questions.explanation:
Taking a class to get his P.I. license

	Harry had to take the class, and earn his P.I. License in order to stay on as a consultant with the Chicago Police. He did poorly on the test, but the instructor liked him and passed him anyway.

Mr. Brennan

	Mr. Brennan was his P.I. teacher. He was trying to find out if $250 would be enough to keep him in the class. When he walked into Brennan's office he found the man dead in his chair.

questions.text: During an investigation, Harry was given the address of 1060 W. Addison Street for a client. What Chicago based baseball team's stadium is actually located at that address?
questions.explanation:
Cubs.

	That is the address for Wrigley Field. The show is set in Chicago, and was written into the script as an in-joke. The investigation also led him to eat stadium style hot dogs outside of the house. Among the options, only the Cubs are a baseball team.

questions.text: Was Felicity Jones cheating on her husband?
questions.explanation:
No.

	She was actually going to a fertility clinic to try to get pregnant. Her husband was the final client of Jim Brennan.

questions.text: What name did both Jim and his assistant Liz called Dresden?
questions.explanation:
Harvey.

	In class Jim Brennan called him Harvey repeatedly. While investigating Jim's death, Liz referred to him as the same. She asked what his name actually was and he told her she was a detective, and should figure it out.

questions.text: What was thrown through the window of Harry's business?
questions.explanation:
Bomb.

	Harry used his magic hockey stick to put a forcefield around the bomb and contain the blast. He did so in front of Liz though, who wasn't a member of the magical community. Containing the bomb took most of Harry's energy.

questions.text: The fertility doctor had his license revoked in which state?
questions.explanation:
California.

	Liz said he must have been a terrible doctor because you can get away with just about anything in California. The character, Dr. Overland, was never given a first name. He was killed in the same manner as Brennan.

questions.text: Dresden got arrested for breaking and entering.
questions.explanation:
True.

	When Lt. Murphy arrived at the doctor's office she told Dresden she should arrest him for breaking and entering. To which he replied, nothing was broken and there were no posted hours.

questions.text: Who turned out to be the Incubus?
questions.explanation:
Mr. Jones

	Mr. Jones was an Incubus, or a being that is evil and needs to take possession of others in order to make its own children. He had sent his wife to be used as a fertile body to use as a vessel for his own child.

questions.text: What happened to Liz at the end of the episode?
questions.correct: She took over Brennan's P.I. school.
options: She got married to a ghost.
questions.explanation:
She took over Brennan's P.I. school.

	Dresden offered to help her get the permits needed to stay in business as both a Private Investigator and the teacher of the classes to become one. She agreed to send him some business from time to time.
